item.title: Sam & Jony
item.description: Building a family of AI products for everyone. Link to article: https://openai.com/sam-and-jony

item.title: Working with 400,000 teachers to shape the future of AI in schools
item.description: OpenAI partners with the American Federation of Teachers to launch a 5-year initiative equipping 400,000 K-12 educators to lead AI innovation in classrooms. Link to article: https://openai.com/global-affairs/aft
